function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to high circulation and close proximity in built-up areas.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within the population and building occupants.","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, improved ventilation, and regular disinfection protocols.","Technologies":"Air purification systems, contactless entry systems, and occupancy monitoring sensors.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and surrounding community.","Owner":"Building managers, property owners, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation in the car parking building.","Impact":"Risk of airborne disease transmission and poor air quality within the parking structure.","Mitigation":"Installation of ventilation systems, air purifiers, and periodic air quality testing.","Technologies":"Ventilation fans, air filtration units, and air quality monitoring sensors.","People":"Car park users, maintenance staff, and adjacent building occupants.","Owner":"Car park management, property owners, facility maintenance team."}]}
